title: DEWALT 20V MAX Cordless Drill and Impact Driver, Power Tool Combo Kit with 2 Batteries and Charger, Yellow/Black (DCK240C2)
descriptions: Introducing the DEWALT 20V MAX Cordless Drill and Impact Driver Combo Kit. This powerful kit includes the DCD771 20V Max 1/2-inch Drill/Driver and the DCF885 1/4-inch Impact Driver. With their compact and lightweight designs, these cordless tools are perfect for reaching tight areas. The ergonomic handle ensures comfort and control during use. The DCK240C2 kit is capable of completing a wide range of applications, thanks to the high-performance motor that delivers 300 unit watts out (UWO) of power. The DCF885 Impact Driver features a 1-handed loading 1/4-inch hex chuck that accepts 1-inch bit tips, while the DCD771 Drill/Driver boasts a 2-speed transmission for versatile performance. Additionally, the DCF885 offers a 3 LED light ring with a 20-second delay for enhanced visibility without shadows. This combo kit also includes 2 batteries and a charger, making it a convenient and reliable choice for all your power tool needs. Don't miss out on this outstanding DEWALT tool kit. Order yours today!

This power tool set includes the DCD771 20V Max Drill/Driver and the DCF885 1/4-inch Impact Driver, both featuring a compact and lightweight design that easily fits into tight spaces. The DCD771 drill has a 2-speed transmission and a high-performance motor that delivers 300 unit watts out (UWO) of power, making it perfect for a wide range of applications. The DCF885 impact driver has a 1-handed loading chuck that accepts 1-inch bit tips, and it also features a 3 LED light ring for enhanced visibility without shadows. With this kit, you'll have everything you need to tackle any project with ease. Get the DEWALT 20V MAX Cordless Drill and Impact Driver Combo Kit today!
